products.title: Azurite Chenille Honey Yellow Curtain
products.description: Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. These soft honey curtains fuse a plush, luxury feel in a contemporary yellow tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. Pair with cool modern greys or contrasting navy to act as a statement piece within your interior. This fabric will provide an elegant finish to rooms filled with wooden and natural tones.
